function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Future research work on COVID-19 in the construction industry could lead to increased exposure to the virus","Impact":"Potential increase in the spread of COVID-19 within the construction industry","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, conduct regular testing, and promote vaccination among construction workers","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and testing equipment","People":"Construction workers, researchers, and academics","Owner":"Health and safety departments, government health agencies, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Expansion of the study to different countries and sectors may lead to the global spread of COVID-19 variants","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 variants spreading across borders and sectors","Mitigation":"Coordinate with international health organizations, implement strict travel and trade restrictions, and promote global vaccination efforts","Technologies":"International health databases, vaccine distribution systems, and border control technologies","People":"International travelers, workers in various sectors, and public health officials","Owner":"International health organizations, government authorities, and public health agencies"}]}
